title: Increase investment-capital and output per worker

content.question: An increase in net investment leads to faster economic growth because capital per worker and output per worker will change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Capital per Worker Output per Worker Increase Increase
Capital per Worker Output per Worker Increase Decrease
Capital per Worker Output per Worker No change Increase
Capital per Worker Output per Worker Decrease Increase
Capital per Worker Output per Worker Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Capital per Worker Output per Worker Increase Increase

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
